trans-unit.source: Troubleshooting the ATA error log | Microsoft ATA
trans-unit.target: Troubleshooting the ATA error log | Microsoft ATA

trans-unit.source: Describes how you can troubleshoot common errors in ATA
trans-unit.target: Describes how you can troubleshoot common errors in ATA

trans-unit.source: Applies to: Advanced Threat Analytics version 1.7
trans-unit.target: Applies to: Advanced Threat Analytics version 1.7

trans-unit.source: Troubleshooting the ATA error log
trans-unit.target: Troubleshooting the ATA error log

trans-unit.source: This section details possible errors in the deployments of ATA and the steps required for troubleshooting them.
trans-unit.target: This section details possible errors in the deployments of ATA and the steps required for troubleshooting them.

trans-unit.source: ATA Gateway errors
trans-unit.target: ATA Gateway errors

trans-unit.source: Error
trans-unit.target: Error

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Resolution
trans-unit.target: Resolution

trans-unit.source: System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapException: A local error occurred
trans-unit.target: System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapException: A local error occurred

trans-unit.source: The ATA Gateway failed to authenticate against the domain controller.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Gateway failed to authenticate against the domain controller.

trans-unit.source: 1. Confirm that the domain controller’s DNS record is configured properly in the DNS server.
trans-unit.target: 1. Confirm that the domain controller’s DNS record is configured properly in the DNS server.

trans-unit.source: 2. Verify that the time of the ATA Gateway is synchronized with the time of the domain controller.
trans-unit.target: 2. Verify that the time of the ATA Gateway is synchronized with the time of the domain controller.

trans-unit.source: System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException: Failed to validate certificate chain
trans-unit.target: System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException: Failed to validate certificate chain

trans-unit.source: The ATA Gateway failed to validate the certificate of the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Gateway failed to validate the certificate of the ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: 1. Verify that the Root CA certificate is installed in the trusted certificate authority certificate store on the ATA Gateway.
trans-unit.target: 1. Verify that the Root CA certificate is installed in the trusted certificate authority certificate store on the ATA Gateway.

trans-unit.source: 2. Validate that the certificate revocation list (CRL) is available and that certificate revocation validation can be performed.
trans-unit.target: 2. Validate that the certificate revocation list (CRL) is available and that certificate revocation validation can be performed.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.Common.ExtendedException: Failed to parse time generated
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.Common.ExtendedException: Failed to parse time generated

trans-unit.source: The ATA Gateway failed to parse syslog messages that were forwarded from the SIEM.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Gateway failed to parse syslog messages that were forwarded from the SIEM.

trans-unit.source: Verify that the SIEM is configured to forward the messages in one of the formats that are supported by ATA.
trans-unit.target: Verify that the SIEM is configured to forward the messages in one of the formats that are supported by ATA.

trans-unit.source: System.ServiceModel.FaultException: An error occurred when verifying security for the message.
trans-unit.target: System.ServiceModel.FaultException: An error occurred when verifying security for the message.

trans-unit.source: The ATA Gateway failed to authenticate against ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Gateway failed to authenticate against ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: Verify that the time of the ATA Gateway is synchronized with the time of the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: Verify that the time of the ATA Gateway is synchronized with the time of the ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: System.ServiceModel.EndpointNotFoundException: Could not connect to net.tcp://center.ip.addr:443/IEntityReceiver
trans-unit.target: System.ServiceModel.EndpointNotFoundException: Could not connect to net.tcp://center.ip.addr:443/IEntityReceiver

trans-unit.source: The ATA Gateway failed to establish connection to the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Gateway failed to establish connection to the ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the network settings are correct and that the network connection between the ATA Gateway and the ATA Center is active.
trans-unit.target: Ensure that the network settings are correct and that the network connection between the ATA Gateway and the ATA Center is active.

trans-unit.source: System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapException: The LDAP server is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapException: The LDAP server is unavailable.

trans-unit.source: The ATA Gateway failed to query the domain controller using the LDAP protocol.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Gateway failed to query the domain controller using the LDAP protocol.

trans-unit.source: 1.Verify that the user account used by ATA to connect to the Active Directory domain has read access to all the objects in the Active Directory tree.
trans-unit.target: 1.Verify that the user account used by ATA to connect to the Active Directory domain has read access to all the objects in the Active Directory tree.

trans-unit.source: 2.Make sure that the domain controller is not hardened to prevent LDAP queries from the user account used by ATA.
trans-unit.target: 2.Make sure that the domain controller is not hardened to prevent LDAP queries from the user account used by ATA.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.Tri.Infrastructure.ContractException: Contract exception
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.Tri.Infrastructure.ContractException: Contract exception

trans-unit.source: The ATA Gateway failed to synchronize the configuration from the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Gateway failed to synchronize the configuration from the ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: Complete configuration of the ATA Gateway in the ATA Console.
trans-unit.target: Complete configuration of the ATA Gateway in the ATA Console.

trans-unit.source: System.Reflection.ReflectionTypeLoadException: Unable to load one or more of the requested types.
trans-unit.target: System.Reflection.ReflectionTypeLoadException: Unable to load one or more of the requested types.

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the LoaderExceptions property for more information.
trans-unit.target: Retrieve the LoaderExceptions property for more information.

trans-unit.source: Message Analyzer is installed on the ATA Gateway.
trans-unit.target: Message Analyzer is installed on the ATA Gateway.

trans-unit.source: Uninstall Message Analyzer.
trans-unit.target: Uninstall Message Analyzer.

trans-unit.source: Error [Layout] System.OutOfMemoryException: Exception of type 'System.OutOfMemoryException' was thrown.
trans-unit.target: Error [Layout] System.OutOfMemoryException: Exception of type 'System.OutOfMemoryException' was thrown.

trans-unit.source: The ATA Gateway does not have enough memory.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Gateway does not have enough memory.

trans-unit.source: Increase the amount of memory on the domain controller.
trans-unit.target: Increase the amount of memory on the domain controller.

trans-unit.source: Fail to start live consumer ---> Microsoft.Opn.Runtime.Monitoring.MessageSessionException: The PEFNDIS event provider is not ready
trans-unit.target: Fail to start live consumer ---> Microsoft.Opn.Runtime.Monitoring.MessageSessionException: The PEFNDIS event provider is not ready

trans-unit.source: PEF (Message Analyzer) was not installed correctly.
trans-unit.target: PEF (Message Analyzer) was not installed correctly.

trans-unit.source: If using Hyper-V, try to upgrade the Hyper-V Integration services otherwise, contact support for a workaround.
trans-unit.target: If using Hyper-V, try to upgrade the Hyper-V Integration services otherwise, contact support for a workaround.

trans-unit.source: Installation failed with error: 0x80070652
trans-unit.target: Installation failed with error: 0x80070652

trans-unit.source: There are other pending installations on your computer.
trans-unit.target: There are other pending installations on your computer.

trans-unit.source: Wait for the other installations to complete and, if necessary, restart the computer.
trans-unit.target: Wait for the other installations to complete and, if necessary, restart the computer.

trans-unit.source: System.InvalidOperationException: Instance 'Microsoft.Tri.Gateway' does not exist in the specified Category.
trans-unit.target: System.InvalidOperationException: Instance 'Microsoft.Tri.Gateway' does not exist in the specified Category.

trans-unit.source: PIDs was enabled for process names in the ATA Gateway
trans-unit.target: PIDs was enabled for process names in the ATA Gateway

trans-unit.source: Use [KB281884](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/281884) to disable PIDs in process names
trans-unit.target: Use [KB281884](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/281884) to disable PIDs in process names

trans-unit.source: System.InvalidOperationException: Category does not exist.
trans-unit.target: System.InvalidOperationException: Category does not exist.

trans-unit.source: Counters might be disabled in the registry
trans-unit.target: Counters might be disabled in the registry

trans-unit.source: Use [KB2554336](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/2554336) to rebuild Performance Counters
trans-unit.target: Use [KB2554336](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/2554336) to rebuild Performance Counters

trans-unit.source: System.ApplicationException: Unable to start ETW session MMA-ETW-Livecapture-a4f595bd-f567-49a7-b963-20fa4e370329
trans-unit.target: System.ApplicationException: Unable to start ETW session MMA-ETW-Livecapture-a4f595bd-f567-49a7-b963-20fa4e370329

trans-unit.source: There is a host entry in the HOSTS file pointing to the machine's shortname
trans-unit.target: There is a host entry in the HOSTS file pointing to the machine's shortname

trans-unit.source: Remove the host entry from C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc\HOSTS file or change it to an FQDN.
trans-unit.target: Remove the host entry from C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc\HOSTS file or change it to an FQDN.

trans-unit.source: ATA IIS errors (Not applicable for ATA v1.7 and above)
trans-unit.target: ATA IIS errors (Not applicable for ATA v1.7 and above)

trans-unit.source: Error
trans-unit.target: Error

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Resolution
trans-unit.target: Resolution

trans-unit.source: HTTP Error 500.19 – Internal Server Error
trans-unit.target: HTTP Error 500.19 – Internal Server Error

trans-unit.source: The IIS URL Rewrite module failed to install correctly.
trans-unit.target: The IIS URL Rewrite module failed to install correctly.

trans-unit.source: Uninstall and reinstall the IIS URL Rewrite module.
trans-unit.target: Uninstall and reinstall the IIS URL Rewrite module.

trans-unit.source: Download the IIS URL Rewrite module
trans-unit.target: Download the IIS URL Rewrite module

trans-unit.target: Deployment errors

trans-unit.target: Error

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Resolution
trans-unit.target: Resolution

trans-unit.source: .Net Framework 4.6.1 installation fails with error 0x800713ec
trans-unit.target: .Net Framework 4.6.1 installation fails with error 0x800713ec

trans-unit.source: The pre-requisites for .Net Framework 4.6.1 are not installed on the server.
trans-unit.target: The pre-requisites for .Net Framework 4.6.1 are not installed on the server.

trans-unit.source: Before installing ATA, verify that the windows updates [KB2919442](https://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=42135) and [KB2919355](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/2919355) are installed on the server.
trans-unit.target: Before installing ATA, verify that the windows updates [KB2919442](https://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=42135) and [KB2919355](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/2919355) are installed on the server.
